mapper.select: SELECT MT_CODE, MT_NAME, MATERIAL_TYPE, SPECIFICATION, UNIT, UNIT_PRICE, SAFETY_STOCK, COMM, STC_CODE, UPDATE_DATE, CURRENT_STC, LEADTIME FROM MT

SELECT mt.MT_CODE, mt.MT_NAME,
bd.QUANTITY_REQUIRED, mt.CURRENT_STC, mt.SAFETY_STOCK, prd.PRD_NAME AS prdName FROM PLAN p JOIN PLAN_DETAIL pd ON p.PLAN_CODE = pd.PLAN_CODE JOIN PRD prd ON pd.PRD_NAME = prd.PRD_NAME JOIN BOM bom ON prd.PRD_CODE = bom.PRD_CODE JOIN B_DETAIL bd ON bom.BOM_CODE = bd.BOM_CODE JOIN MT mt ON bd.MT_CODE = mt.MT_CODE WHERE p.PLAN_CODE = #{planCode} ORDER BY mt.MT_CODE
